title: Windows 8.1 RuEn AIO + Office 2013 (x86x64) 24in1 24.12.2013 [Ru
description:
Program Version: 24/12/2013
Language: Russian/English

Treatment: there
The type of treatment: KMS-activator (optional before installing)

System requirements:

- Processor: 1 GHz or more.
- RAM: 1 GB (32-bit) or 2 GB (64-bit system)
- Free space on hard drive: 16 GB (32-bit) or 20 GB (64-bit system).
- Graphics card: Microsoft DirectX 9 with the driver WDDM.

Description:
Updated on December 12 editions of Windows 8.1 + 12 editions with integrated Office 2013. Integrated in all editions. NET Framework 3.5, RuntimePack Lite, DirectX and Microsoft Visual C + + 2005-2008-2010-2012-2013 Redistributable Package x86 & x64. 2 language system and Office 2013: Russian and English.

Assembly based on the original images. Do not cut. UEFI Support only on DVD!

List of editions:
Windows 8.1 Single Language (32-bit)
Windows 8.1 Core (32-bit)
Windows 8.1 Professional (32-bit)
Windows 8.1 Professional Media Center (32-bit)
Windows 8.1 Professional VL (32-bit)
Windows 8.1 Enterprise (32-bit)
Windows 8.1 Single Language (64-bit)
Windows 8.1 Core (64-bit)
Windows 8.1 Professional (64-bit)
Windows 8.1 Professional Media Center (64-bit)
Windows 8.1 Professional VL (64-bit)
Windows 8.1 Enterprise (64-bit)

+ EDITORIAL THE SAME WITH INTEGRATED OFFICE 2013

Checksums:
CRC32: 3F085696
MD5: C16725C743B9C0F34ECC3D364190F8E0
SHA-1: B856AF101EFFD532ACEB202CE81016D29072E48F

Recording on flash:
Rufus, UltraISO

Due to the large size install81.wim flash drive must be formatted in NTFS.
Consequently, support for UEFI on the flash drive will be absent.

Tick ??"avtoaktivatsii Windows":
Fully automatic activation. System and Office (when selected) will be in an activated state at the first boot. Activator used KMSAuto Net.

Check the "Start menu Return''
StartIsBack + 1.0.5 medicine

Tick ??"Apply a set of tweaks":
Tweaks are located along paths smbb  Setup  81_ $ oem $  $ $  Setup  Scripts  Tweaks and smbb  Setup  $ oem $ _scripts_shared  Tweaks. Open reg-files with a text editor. There are descriptions of all Tweek. Edit under him as you please.
